com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils

Class NumberConversion.LittleEndian

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils.NumberConversion.LittleEndian
  • Enclosing class:
    NumberConversion

    public static class NumberConversion.LittleEndian
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for little endian base order

    Version:
    1.0, 8 Jan 2015
    Author:
    STMicroelectronics - Central Labs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LittleEndian() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float bytesToFloat(byte[] arr)
      Returns the float value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from index 0 in the array and 4 bytes length.
      static float bytesToFloat(byte[] arr, int start)
      Returns the float value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from a specified index start in the array and 4 bytes length.
      static short bytesToInt16(byte[] arr)
      Returns the short value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from index 0 in the array and 2 bytes length.
      static short bytesToInt16(byte[] arr, int start)
      Returns the short value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from a specified index start in the array and 2 bytes length.
      static int bytesToInt32(byte[] arr)
      Returns the int value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from index 0 in the array and 4 bytes length.
      static int bytesToInt32(byte[] arr, int start)
      Returns the int value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from a specified index start in the array and 4 bytes length.
      static int bytesToUInt16(byte[] arr)
      Returns the unsigned short value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from index 0 in the array and 2 bytes length.
      static int bytesToUInt16(byte[] arr, int start)
      Returns the unsigned short value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from a specified index start in the array and 2 bytes length.
      static long bytesToUInt32(byte[] arr)
      Returns the unsigned int value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from index 0 in the array and 4 bytes length.
      static long bytesToUInt32(byte[] arr, int start)
      Returns the unsigned int value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from a specified index start in the array and 4 bytes length.
      static byte[] floatToBytes(float value)
      Returns the bytes array in little endian format of the value to convert.
      static byte[] int16ToBytes(short value)
      Returns the bytes array in little endian format of the value to convert.
      static byte[] int32ToBytes(int value)
      Returns the bytes array in little endian format of the value to convert.
      static byte[] uint16ToBytes(int value)
      Returns the bytes array in little endian format of the value to convert.
      static byte[] uint32ToBytes(long value)
      Returns the bytes array in little endian format of the value to convert.

                                 int start)
        Returns the short value for the specified bytes array in little endian format, from a specified index start in the array and 2 bytes length.
        Parameters:
        arr - input bytes array that contains the value to convert
        start - start index in the array of the value to convert
        Returns:
        the short value converted

        Returns:
